Package gamePlay

Class ResourceLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • gamePlay.ResourceLoader
  • public class ResourceLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    This class loads all of our resources and allows different classes to easily access resources Has the ability to access images, sounds, textures
    Version:
    5/21/18 9:31
    Author:
    bleistiko405

      • getTexture

        public processing.core.PImage getTexture​(java.lang.String name,
                                         java.awt.Point size,
                                         java.awt.Point cropBounds)
        This will return a cropped image. bounds of (0, 0) are for raw scaled images
        Parameters:
        name - - the name of the key for the image
        size - - the size of the texture you want to get
        Returns:
        the cropped image
